title: x/build/builders: GCE builders rebuilding Go 1.4 stdlib
body:
Looking at builder output from the builders for OpenBSD (e.g., http://build.golang.org/log/17dc0b960c3584cd864234107690de0ceca8ade1) and FreeBSD (e.g., http://build.golang.org/log/7c05e6bebd2e58ae1cdc6ee7ccccea1707e4ca65) you can see that when building the bootstrap toolchain, packages from the Go 1.4 stdlib are being rebuilt too.  Probably not slowing things down terribly, but would be better if they didn't need to.

By comparison, Linux (e.g., http://build.golang.org/log/f049cba51bdf31fda8fd7df29b9ec31e5be530b7) only builds the bootstrap/* packages/commands.
